GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Do Not Mail Remove Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Do Not Mail Remove Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_DONOTMAILREMOVE (
@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @CONSTITUENTSELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID)
declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1
declare @SEQUENCE int declare @SOLICITCODEID uniqueidentifier
select @SEQUENCE=coalesce(max(SEQUENCE),0)+1 from dbo.SOLICITCODE select @SOLICITCODEID=id from solicitcode where DESCRIPTION = 'Do Not Mail - Priority 1'
-- insert records that meet criteria (catalog item = '69.RHCEI12HD' at this point) insert into @T select ID from @CONSTITUENTSELECTION
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
declare @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier declare @PRIMARYWITHDONOTMAILCOUNT int --used when multiple addresses to see if primary is flagged do not mail declare @NONPRIMARYWITHOUTDONOTMAILCOUNT int declare @ORIGINALPRIMARYDONOTMAILADDRESSID uniqueidentifier declare @ADDRESSCOUNT int declare @SINGLEADDRESSDONOTMAILCOUNT int
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENTID from @T where PK = @I
set @ADDRESSCOUNT = 0 set @SINGLEADDRESSDONOTMAILCOUNT = 0 select @ADDRESSCOUNT = count(*) from address where constituentid = @CONSTITUENTID --If only 1 address for constituent, then uncheck donotmail and insert solicit code of "Do Not Mail - Priority 1" and use @SEQENCE value from above if @ADDRESSCOUNT = 1 begin select @SINGLEADDRESSDONOTMAILCOUNT = count(*) from address where constituentid = @CONSTITUENTID and donotmail = 1 if @SINGLEADDRESSDONOTMAILCOUNT = 1 begin set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + 1; update ADDRESS set DONOTMAIL = 0 where constituentid=@CONSTITUENTID
begin try insert into dbo.[CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE] ([SOLICITCODEID],[CONSTITUENTID],[COMMENTS],[SEQUENCE],[ADDEDBYID],[CHANGEDBYID],[DATEADDED],[DATECHANGED]) values (@SOLICITCODEID,@CONSTITUENTID,'BBEC Conversion/Do Not Mail Remove GC',@SEQUENCE,@CHANGEAGENTID,@CHANGEAGENTID,@CURRENTDATE,@CURRENTDATE) end try begin catch -- do nothing (solicit code likely exists) end catch end end --If multiple address, check to see if primary has donotmail flag and nonprimary addresses exist w/o donotmailflag. If both are true --then store id of original primary and then change to nonprimary, then set primary to latest nonprimary added w/o donotmail flag. if @ADDRESSCOUNT > 1 begin select @PRIMARYWITHDONOTMAILCOUNT = count(*) from address where constituentid= @CONSTITUENTID and isprimary = 1 and donotmail = 1 select @NONPRIMARYWITHOUTDONOTMAILCOUNT = count(*) from address where constituentid= @CONSTITUENTID and isprimary = 0 and donotmail = 0 if @PRIMARYWITHDONOTMAILCOUNT = 1 and @NONPRIMARYWITHOUTDONOTMAILCOUNT > 0 begin set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + 1;
select @ORIGINALPRIMARYDONOTMAILADDRESSID = id from address where constituentid=@CONSTITUENTID and isprimary=1 and donotmail=1
update ADDRESS set ISPRIMARY = 0 where ID = @ORIGINALPRIMARYDONOTMAILADDRESSID
update address set isprimary = 1 where id in ( select top 1 id from address where constituentid=@CONSTITUENTID and isprimary = 0 and donotmail = 0 and id <> @ORIGINALPRIMARYDONOTMAILADDRESSID order by datechanged desc ) end if @PRIMARYWITHDONOTMAILCOUNT = 1 and @NONPRIMARYWITHOUTDONOTMAILCOUNT = 0 begin set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + 1; update ADDRESS set DONOTMAIL = 0 where constituentid=@CONSTITUENTID and isprimary = 1 and donotmail = 1
begin try insert into dbo.[CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE] ([SOLICITCODEID],[CONSTITUENTID],[COMMENTS],[SEQUENCE],[ADDEDBYID],[CHANGEDBYID],[DATEADDED],[DATECHANGED]) values (@SOLICITCODEID,@CONSTITUENTID,'BBEC Conversion/Do Not Mail Remove GC',@SEQUENCE,@CHANGEAGENTID,@CHANGEAGENTID,@CURRENTDATE,@CURRENTDATE) end try begin catch -- do nothing (solicit code likely exists) end catch
end end
set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
